work.description: I work as an engineer for the Platform Core API at Mural, most specifically in building the new Webhooks API.
I worked on a product called WEX EDGE, which focuses on providing fleet businesses with purchase and payment solutions for hotels, fuel, tires and other fleet-relevant products and services.

During my time at EISA, a subsidiary of Ericsson, I had the opportunity to work on large telecommunication software solutions for customers in Brazil and the Ukraine. In January of 2019 I had the opportunity to travel to Kyiv, Ukraine to provide on-site support for our customers.
At VXCase, I developed a mobile app used by managers to control and organize their business andan internal ERP for the company

education.title: Master on Systems and Products Engineering
education.details: Federal Institute of Bahia campus Salvador (IFBA), 2019 - Current

accomplishments.title: Ericsson on site support in Kyiv - Ukraine
accomplishments.details: In 2019, I had the opportunity to travel to Kyiv to provide on-site support for the systems my team and I developed, to the Ericsson Team.

accomplishments.title: 2nd Place in an innovation contest
accomplishments.details: IFBA organizes an annual contest called "Uma ideia na cabeça uma inovação na mão". In 2016, I won second place with a proposal to use Kinect API to improve the teaching and learning process for biology classes, specifically DNA studies.

accomplishments.title: My code became example in a compiler!
accomplishments.details: That was probably the first achievement of my career. I made a keyboard-based paint editor in Pascal in 2012. It was accepted by the Brazilian compiler PascalZim as the "EditorHugo.pas" example!

accomplishments.title: Presentation of talks/workshops/lives
accomplishments.details: I enjoy sharing my knowledge and learning! I have had the opportunity to present at many events like SEMCOMP, SNCT, Linguagil, Love Bits Lives, Software Freedom Day and others.
